title: London Office Space Goes Green, Helping Developers Get in the Black
sub_head: To lure back employees, companies are opting for state-of-the-art buildings with low- or zero-carbon emissions
body:
Londoners are returning to the office again, and a new wave of green buildings is enabling landlords to charge their tenants a rent premium.
To lure back employees, companies are opting for state-of-the-art buildings featuring wellness and leisure facilities with low- or zero-carbon emissions, which younger workers in particular consider vital. Many major U.K. firms also have their own environmental targets to meet.
